          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Light refraction in water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Brechung im Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réfraction légère dans l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refraction claro na água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rifrazione chiara in acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά διάθλαση στο ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refracción ligera en agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experiment which can be used to demonstrate the different refractive indexes between air and water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">beaker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bending</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Pencil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refractive index</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einem Experiment, welches 
verwendet werden kann, um die unterschiedlichen Brechungskoeffizienten
zwischen Luft und Wasser zu demonstrieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre à une expérience ce 
qui peut être employé pour démontrer les différents indices de 
réfraction entre l'air et l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a uma experiência qual 
pode ser usado demonstrar os deslocamentos predeterminados refractive 
diferentes entre o ar e a água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra ad un esperimento 
quale può essere usato per dimostrare gli indici di rifrazione 
differenti fra aria ed acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα πείραμα που μπορεί 
να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να καταδείξει τα διαφορετικά διαθλαστικά 
ευρετήρια μεταξύ του αέρα και του ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra a experimento cuál se 
puede utilizar para demostrar los diversos índices refractivos entre 
el aire y el agua.</string>
          </description>
